appDesc.message: No pierda el tiempo con acortadores. FastForward evita los molestos acortadores de links.

firstrunNoScript.message: Sin embargo, parece que está utilizando NoScript o similar, con el que FastForward no es compatible.

updateYes.message: Se han descargado con éxito las definiciones de bypass.

updateNo.message: Las definiciones de bypass están actualizadas.

bypassCounter.message: FastForward ha evitado % sitios por ti.

optionsNavigationDelay.message: Llévame a los destinos después de % segundo(s).

optionsTrackerBypass.message: Evitar rastreadores (como bit.ly y t.co) utilizando Apimon.de.

optionsInstantNavigationTrackers.message: Instantly take me to destinations of trackers.

optionsBlockIPLoggers.message: Block IP loggers if they can't be bypassed.

optionsCrowdBypass.message: Crowd Bypass: Dar y tomar los destinos de acortadores no evitables.

optionsCrowdAutoOpen.message: Open crowd-sourced destinations in a new tab after % second(s).

optionsCrowdAutoClose.message: Close tab containing the crowd-sourced destination after % second(s) of visiting it.

optionsUserscriptsDescription.message: This is an advanced feature for developers to create their own scripts to bypass sites. Once perfected, they can then be submitted on GitHub to be added to FastForward, so they're available to everyone.

beforeNavigateUnsafe.message: However, if you navigate now, they will detect FastForward.

beforeNavigateUnsafeTimer.message: You will no longer be detected in % seconds.

beforeNavigateUnsafeTimerSingular.message: You will no longer be detected in 1 second.

beforeNavigateTimer.message: You will be redirected automatically in % seconds.

beforeNavigateTimerSingular.message: You will be redirected automatically in 1 second.

beforeNavigateOptions.message: Do you want to be redirected instantly or in x seconds?

infoLinkvertise.message: FastForward requiere que completes el captcha antes de que podamos evitar este sitio para usted. Después de hacer esto, ¡podemos omitir los molestos pasos!

infoFileHoster.message: Unfortunately, the download server will ensure that you have waited before allowing you to download the file.

infoOutdated.message: Este sitio web es evitado por una nueva versión de FastForward.

crowdWait.message: Unfortunately, you're the first to encounter this link, but after you've waited, other FastForward users will no longer have to.

crowdDisabled.message: Este sitio web es evitado por el crowd bypass, que puedes activar en las opciones.

crowdBypassed.message: Puede que no tenga que esperar!

crowdBypassedInfo.message: Otros usuarios de FastForward ya han esperado por ti y han reportado que esto va a %

crowdBypassedTimer.message: Se abrirá en una nueva pestaña en % segundo.

crowdBypassedTimerSingular.message: Se abrirá en una nueva pestaña en 1 segundo.

crowdCloseTimer.message: This tab will close in % seconds.

crowdCloseTimerSingular.message: This tab will close in 1 second.

crowdBypassedOptions.message: ¿Quieres que se abra en una nueva pestaña al instante o en x segundos?

blockedTitle.message: FastForward prevented your IP from being logged.

blockedSubtitle.message: Don't want FastForward to prevent bad actors from getting your IP?
